unparsed_output:
To determine the total expenses, the following expenses need to be added together:

• CME Expense: $25,000
• Honorarium, Speaker: $195,000
• Speaker, Air Travel: $48,000
• Speaker Ground Travel: $3,000
• Speaker Rooms: $9,000
• Food and Beverage: $130,000
• Speaker Expenses: $3,000
• LCD Projector: $65,000
• Express Communications, etc: $25,000

*Answer*: $503,000
